story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0100_: I wonder when Diantha’s show is gonna start!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_: There’s still five minutes until curtain time.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0400_: Let’s have a look at the pamphlet until then.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0500_:
Wow, Trevs. I didn’t know you’d be so serious
about watching plays, too.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0600_:
It’s a special opportunity, so I’d like to enjoy
100 percent of it!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0700_:
I feel like it’s been a while since I’ve seen you two
go back and forth like this.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0800_:
That’s true! The five of us haven’t gotten together
since we traveled around Kalos!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_0900_:
With Diantha acting in this play, I’m sure it’ll be
super enjoyable...
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_: I hope the plot isn’t too difficult to understand.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1200_: It’s set in ancient Kalos, right?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1400_:
Indeed. A long time ago, there was a war
in Kalos...
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1600_: Did you come to watch the show, too?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1700_: Are you actually a fan of Diantha or something?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1800_:
Hahaha! I just wanted to see a play in person
for once!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_1900_:
Also, there’s a deep meaning behind this
play, right?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2000_:
Around 3,000 years have passed since the war in
ancient Kalos ended...
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2100_:
So this is part of the peace ceremony on Pasio,
which is being held to commemorate that.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2200_:
I see! I’m so glad I got to see Serena and Calem
again on such a special day! ♪
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2300_:
I want to make memories with everyone, even
here on Pasio!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2400_: Making memories is nice and all, but...
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2500_:
Is anyone curious about that rumor going around?
That there’s a mysterious, invisible Pokémon
on Pasio?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_2700_:
I’ve only heard rumors, so I’m not sure if it
actually exists.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1101_2800_: Hello, everyone. Sorry for keeping you waiting.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3100_: The fires of war have reached this country...
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3200_:
Why do people fight? Why do we steal what
limited resources we have from each other?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3300_:
Why can’t we be peaceful and understand
each other?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3500_:
(If the intel I got is true, then something is going to
happen around now...)
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3600_: (I need to stay alert and aware...)
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_3700_: (I know... I know I have to... But...but!)
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4100_:
I guess he was really looking forward to seeing
the play, huh.
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4300_: Team Flare is claiming this stage—with style!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4400_: Everyone stay calm and follow our orders!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4600_: What are they doing on Pasio?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4700_: I don’t know...but we have to stop them fast!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_4900_: I will deal with these people!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5000_: Is she signaling that she doesn’t need help?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5100_: You don’t seem to know the rules of battling!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5200_:
You’ll have to face me before you make a move
on anyone else!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5300_: Hah! Do you understand the situation you’re in?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5400_: We came to crash the stage—
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5500_:
Now is the time to show you how brightly the
royal family shines!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5800_:
Its beauty and shine is worthy of its nickname—
the “Royal Pink Princess”!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_5900_:
Diantha’s making the Team Flare intrusion part of
the play!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_6100_: I will protect everyone with my own two hands!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_6200_:
Stop acting tough. You don’t really think you can
defeat all of us, do you?
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_6400_:
This is my mission! Diancie and I will fight for
peace until the end!
story_teamflare_01_01000/2401_1001_6600_:
I’m the new head of the Looker Bureau in
Lumiose City...
